hero.title: Events & Calendar
hero.subtitle: Join us for worship, fellowship, and community outreach

upcomingEvents.title: Upcoming Events
upcomingEvents.subtitle: There's always something happening at our church. Find an event and get involved!

event1.title: Sunday Worship Service
event1.description: Join us for worship, prayer and biblical teaching. Children's programs available at all services.

event2.title: Bible Study Group
event2.description: Mid-week Bible study focused on the book of Romans. Everyone is welcome to join this enriching discussion.

event3.title: Community Outreach
event3.description: Volunteering to help distribute food and supplies to families in need in our local community.

event4.title: Youth Group Meeting
event4.description: Fun, fellowship and faith development for students in grades 6-12. Games, worship and small groups.

event5.title: Women's Breakfast
event5.description: Monthly gathering for women to connect, share and grow together in faith. Breakfast included.

event6.title: Men's Prayer Group
event6.description: Morning prayer and devotion time for men. Coffee and light breakfast included.

calendar.title: Event Calendar
calendar.subtitle: View our full calendar of events and plan your visit
calendar.description: Our interactive calendar would be embedded here, allowing you to view events by day, week, or month.

registration.title: Register for Events
registration.description: Many of our events require registration to help us prepare adequately. Registration is quick and easy!

benefits.title: Benefits of registering for events:
benefits.item2: Reserve your spot for limited-capacity events
benefits.item3: Help us prepare the right amount of materials

registration.questions: If you have questions about an event or need assistance with registration, please contact our church office.

featured.title: Featured Event Registration
featured.eventDescription: Join us for a special celebration of Christ's resurrection. Multiple services available to accommodate everyone.

groups.title: Community Groups
groups.subtitle: Our community groups meet regularly throughout the week for fellowship, Bible study, and prayer

neighborhood.title: Neighborhood Groups
neighborhood.description: Groups that meet in homes throughout the city for fellowship and Bible study.

interest.title: Interest Groups
interest.description: Groups formed around shared interests like hiking, cooking, or book discussions.

support.title: Support Groups
support.description: Groups that provide care and support for specific life challenges.
